mapper.select: SELECT w_no, w_total_count, w_total_price, a_code, TO_CHAR(w_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS w_date FROM wearing_tb ORDER BY w_no DESC
SELECT P_CODE, P_BRAND, P_NAME, P_KIND_CODE FROM product_tb
SELECT pt.P_CODE, P_NO, P_NAME, P_SIZE, P_STOCK FROM PRODUCT_TB pt, PRODUCT_SUB ps WHERE pt.P_CODE = ps.P_CODE AND P_KIND_CODE = #{p_kind_code} ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT P_NAME FROM ( SELECT pt.P_CODE, P_NO, P_NAME, p_size, p_stock FROM PRODUCT_TB pt, PRODUCT_SUB ps WHERE pt.P_CODE = ps.P_CODE AND P_KIND_CODE = #{P_KIND_CODE} )
